reference: [A1] Blanchard, Olivier J., and Charles M. Kahn (1980), The Solution of Linear Difference Models under Rational Expectations, Econometrica 48, 1305--1311.

[A4] Klein, Paul (2000), Using the Generalized Schur Form to Solve a Multivariate Linear Rational Expectations Model, Journal of Economic Dynamics and Control 24, 1405--1423.
[A5] Rudebusch, Glenn D. (1992), Trends and Random Walks in Macroeconomic Time Series: A Re-Examination, International Economic Review 33, 661--680.
[A6] Sims, Christopher A. (2000), Solving Linear Rational Expectations Models, working paper, www.princeton.edu/sims.
